QuestData.Title: Nazmir
QuestData.Description:
The blood trolls within the cursed swamp Nazmir threaten to destroy all of Zuldazar.
Princess Talanji wants the Horde's help in an expedition to strike at the heart of the blood trolls and end their threat to Zuldazar.
QuestData.RewardText: The swamp of Nazmir represents the largest threat to my people. I am glad you chose to help me in this.
